action.action-desc: Mrs. Davis of California (for herself, Ms. Jenkins of Kansas, Mr. McGovern, Mr. Young of Alaska, and Mr. Walz) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to exclude the receipt of basic allowance for housing for members of the Armed Forces in determining eligibility for certain Federal benefits, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Military Hunger Prevention Act.

section.header: Basic allowance for housing and certain Federal benefits

subsection.header: Exclusion of basic allowance for housing
subsection.text: Section 403(k) of title 37, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: In determining eligibility to participate in any Federal program issuing benefits for nutrition assistance (including the Family Subsistence Supplemental Allowance program under section 402a of this title), the value of a housing allowance under this section shall be excluded from any calculation of income, assets, or resources.
